package.description:
This contains some useful tools for creating and testing a kinematics solution for your robot.
To call your kinematics service, such as that provided by 'arm_kinematics_constraint_aware': $ roslaunch arm_kinematics_test get_fk.launch $ roslaunch arm_kinematics_test get_ik.launch
To run a demo of a stand-alone IKFast solver for FK/IK of 6 DOF arm: $ rosrun arm_kinematics_test compute
package.author: David Butterworth
